title: 3 bed 2 bath Cul-de-sac single family home
posting_body: Great 3 bedroom 2 bath culdesac house in Norwalk.
House is located near the norwalk square, morrison elementary and Norwalk high school.
Home offers upgraded kitchen and bathrooms, two car driveway parking, private and relaxing porch area, detached 1-car gargage, two fireplaces and an entertaining bar/den area for family gathering.
Private rear patio for family parties, bbq's and gatherings.
Culdesac offers ample parking, secure area for children to play and private street.
Shopping and freeway access withing minutes.
This is a sought out area of Norwalk due to the proximity of shopping, schools and freeways.
if you are interested in seeing the house and will schedule a time and day to do so.
Look forward to showing you this property.
